The Prodigal Son Returns to Nothing

"We thought we were the storm. It turns out we were just the fog, blown away by the first wind of fear."

The campaign headquarters of the "New Taiwanese Service Team" is not a place of mourning tonight. Mourning implies a loss of something living. This room feels like an archaeological dig—a place where something ancient and dead has been uncovered. The orange flags, once waved with such fanatical zeal, are now piled in corners like trash. The staff are not running; they are sitting in chairs, staring at the walls, catatonic with shock.

You, James Soong, sit alone in your office. The door is closed, but it cannot shut out the truth. The truth is glowing on the small television screen on your desk, mocking you with its cold, digital certainty.

1. Lien Chan (KMT) - ELECTED
2. Chen Shui-bian (DPP)
3. James Soong (Independent)

Third.

You whisper the word, tasting the ashes on your tongue. You are not the President. You are not the Runner-up. You are the loser. You have finished behind the man you called incompetent (Lien) and the man you called dangerous (Chen). The "Soong Wave" that terrified the establishment for six months has crashed against the rocks and vanished without a trace.

Chang Chao-hsiung, your running mate, looks like a man who has aged ten years in ten hours. He pours a glass of water, his hand shaking so badly that half of it spills onto the table. "They went back," Chang whispers, his voice devoid of hope. "The voters... they went back. The 'Iron Votes' returned to the party. The 'Dump-Soong' (棄宋) strategy... it worked perfectly."

You close your eyes, and the realization hits you like a physical blow. You underestimated the Machine. You underestimated the sheer, gravitational pull of the Kuomintang. For fifty years, the KMT *was* the state. And when the moment of truth came—when the voters looked at the abyss of a Chen Shui-bian presidency—they didn't trust the maverick independent to save them. They trusted the Brand. They trusted the Flag. They trusted the Emblem.

You think of Ma Ying-jeou. The "Golden Boy." The assassin with the smile. His release of the "Fake Polls" claiming you were collapsing wasn't just a dirty trick; it was a self-fulfilling prophecy. He told the voters you couldn't win, and because they believed him, they stopped supporting you, ensuring you couldn't win. It was a masterclass in psychological warfare.

And Lee Teng-hui? The old man in the Palace must be laughing so hard his ribs hurt. He played the ultimate game of 4D chess. He knew that by creating a crisis, by raising the tensions with China, by making the election about "Survival" rather than "Reform," the electorate would retreat to the safety of the KMT bunker. He sacrificed his popularity to save the party's grip on power. He destroyed you, his rebellious son, by turning the family against you.

Chen Wan-shui sits beside you. She is the only person in the room who is not crying. She is angry. "They are cowards, Chu-yu," she says, her voice hard. "The people you served... the people whose roads you paved... they abandoned you. As soon as the KMT blew the whistle, they ran back to the master."

You look at the map on the wall. It is a sea of Blue. Lien Chan has swept the North, the Center, the East. He has reclaimed the "Iron Villages." Even in the places where you drew crowds of fifty thousand people, the actual votes went to Lien. The crowds came for the show; they voted for the system.

The television cuts to the KMT Headquarters. It is a coronation. Lien Chan stands there, stiff, boring, utterly uninspiring. He looks like a statue that has been wheeled onto the stage. He is the President-elect not because he is loved, not because he is capable, but because he is the Chair of the Board. The KMT machine realized that if they split, A-Bian would win. So they ruthlessly, efficiently cannibalized your support to feed the official candidate.

And Chen Shui-bian? He is second. A strong second. He has consolidated the opposition. The country is now a two-party state: The KMT and the DPP. And you? You are the anomaly. The glitch that has been corrected.

A young aide knocks on the door. "Governor... the press is gone. Most of them went to the KMT headquarters. There are only a few cameras left."

This hurts more than the anger. Irrelevance. You are yesterday's news. The "Third Force" is dead on arrival.

You stand up. You straighten your orange tie, though it feels like a noose now. You have to go out there. You have to speak to the die-hards, the few loyalists who didn't abandon you.

You walk out to the balcony. The rain is cold. The crowd is sparse. There is no riot tonight. There is no indignation. There is only shame. The shame of people who bet on the wrong horse.

"My friends," you say, your voice echoing in the empty street.

"We tried to show Taiwan a new way," you continue, forcing the words out. "We tried to show that a man is more important than a party card."

A few people clap. It sounds pathetic in the wet night air.

"But tonight, the System has won," you admit, a moment of raw honesty that slips through the politician's mask. "The Fear has won. The people chose the devil they knew over the hope they didn't."

You look toward the KMT headquarters, glowing in the distance. You were the Prince of that party. You were the Secretary-General. You built that machine. And tonight, it rolled over you without slowing down.

"I accept the verdict of the people," you lie. You don't accept it. You despise it. You despise the weakness of the voters who let themselves be manipulated by Ma Ying-jeou's charts and Lee Teng-hui's threats.

You step back from the podium. You turn to Wan-shui. "It's over," you say. "Really over."

You are not the Kingmaker. You are not the King. You are a cautionary tale. A story parents will tell their children about what happens when you try to fight the House.

As you walk back into the shadows of the office, you realize the cruelest joke of all: By running, you didn't destroy the KMT. You saved it. You scared the voters so much that they consolidated around Lien Chan, giving the old regime a new lease on life. You are the savior of your enemy.

`); e.executable.push([0, (() => {e.image = "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/Soong.jpg?v=1765884054496"})]); } if(aa[0].candidate === 68 && aa[1].candidate === 67) { // HTML Content: 2025年，宋楚瑜的第一人稱回憶 (Final English Version) e.pages.push(`

The Autumn of 2025: A Campaign Forgotten by History

— A Monologue from the Old Study

▶ Dust-Covered Memories and a Historical Footnote

It is the autumn of 2025. Outside my window, President Cheng Li-wen has just begun her first term. Taiwan's politics seems to have completely settled into a stable rhythm of 'Blue-Green rotation.'

I sit in my old study, the air thick with the antique scent of books and wood. I have been completely absent from the political scene for ten years. The phones are silent, my staff long scattered. All that remains is this room, filled with **my past**.

▶ That Perpetual Air Force Cap

walk to the back of the storage room and pull open a long-sealed wooden chest. Inside, the most conspicuous item is that Air Force blue campaign cap. I gently brush off the dust, my fingers tracing the brim.

The year 2000. It was the most glorious, yet the most desolate year of my life. In that campaign, I traveled to every corner of Taiwan. The public's yearning for 'my style of efficiency' still feels like a burning dream. But what was the result? Lien Chan won, Chen Shui-bian was second, and I was third. My vast popularity was utterly sacrificed to the voters' 'strategic voting' effect.

That defeat cost me not just the presidency but the future of my entire political faction. After Lien Chan secured re-election in 2004, the Pan-Blue camp fully integrated, treating my PFP as an outsider. By 2008, when Ma Ying-jeou was elected, I was already an irrelevant figure. My party became a failed footnote in history textbooks, used only to explain the KMT's schism.

▶ Flags and Former Friends

At the bottom of the chest lies a yellowed campaign flag with a photograph of my younger self, bearing the slogan, 'Governor of Taiwan Province, the Best Choice.' How ironic. I cannot recall the last time the title of 'Governor' was publicly mentioned.

I pull out a photograph: a group picture from twenty-something years ago, when we first founded the People First Party. Many of the people in the picture have since switched allegiances or retired. Even the towering figures of the past, like Lee Teng-hui—the old superior who pushed me from the core but inadvertently inspired my campaign—passed away five years ago.

They are all gone. Only I remain.

▶ A Sigh, Twenty Years of Void

I return the Air Force cap to the chest and close the lid. Throughout Ma Ying-jeou's eight-year term (2008–2016) and the subsequent eight-year term of Tsai Ing-wen (2016–2024), the political ideals I represented—administrative efficiency, the technocratic style of governance—had no opportunity to flourish.

On the political stage, the spotlight always follows the new actors. Over twenty-five years, the only traces I have left are the dust in this study and those forgotten flags.

I let out a long sigh. In that sound lies the ultimate, most gentle yet most cruel final judgment that Taiwanese politics has rendered upon former strongman over two decades: Forgetfulness.

`); e.executable.push([e.pages.length - 1, (() => {e.image = 'https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/pts_sli_pe_2000_001_001_002_003%5Bby-nc-sa%5D.jpg?v=1765974378589'})]); // Placeholder: Music and Playlist settings if (songChange != 1) { songChange = 1 const lienWin = new Playlist(); const lienWinSong50 = new Song( "Farewell,My Love", "Teresa Teng", "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/t1yAL_sdn7PdmCs-4W2SmiNOv95xyFk9JwW76Z0VFppZxJf3zS2j4QZlxssxHUYuXfpGGFBhMEbAmAj89A", "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/%E9%84%A7%E9%BA%97%E5%90%9B%20Teresa%20Teng%20%E3%83%86%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B5%E3%83%BB%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%20-%20%E5%86%8D%E8%A6%8B%EF%BC%81%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E6%84%9B%E4%BA%BA%20(Lyric%20Video)%20-%20TeresaTengVEVO%20(youtube).mp3?v=1764160566232" ); lienWin.addSong(lienWinSong50,0); changePlaylist(lienWin); } } if (aa[0].candidate === 68 && aa[1].candidate === 67) { // HTML Content: Historical table based on the new timeline (Scenario 20 - KMT Long Streak with interesting VPs). SCP-ZH-999

A Year of SCP-ZH-999's Effect

Effect PeriodParty AffiliationPresidential CandidateVice Presidential CandidateVotesVote PercentageElection Result
2000Independent███Chang Chao-hsiung4,664,93236.84%X
2000KuomintangLien ChanSiew Wan-chang2,925,51323.1%X
2000Democratic Progressive PartyChen Shui-bianLu Hsiu-lien4,977,73739.3%O
(Some candidates omitted)

Summary of Impact on Reality Stability:

The purpose of having ███ run in the 2000 presidential election and ensuring his defeat was to achieve Taiwan's democratization and further expand the effect of SCP-ZH-999 on ███. This allowed the state of regional reality stability to extend to the entire Republic of China, including Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu. This strategy proved effective, as in numerous Foundation simulations of the future, if ███ had not participated, the People's Republic of China would have been highly likely to conduct missile tests or directly attack Taiwan on election day. Most importantly, because of his involvement, a relatively balanced political system emerged, marked by the appearance of a two-party system.

RAISA Observer ███


Effect PeriodParty AffiliationPresidential CandidateVice Presidential CandidateVotesVote PercentageElection Result
2004KuomintangLien Chan███6,442,45249.89%X
2004Democratic Progressive PartyChen Shui-bianLu Hsiu-lien6,471,97050.11%O

Summary of Impact on Reality Stability:

This election represents another case of reality stabilization, implementing various democratic processes such as vote monitoring. The challenges raised by ███'s side, including calls for the invalidation of the election and requests for a recount, repeatedly demonstrated increasing reality stability. The Hume level in the entire region reached 89, approaching the stable value of 100. In fact, even without a recount, the outcome was evident, as it was agreed that ███ functions solely as a reality-stabilizing device. If he were to become president or vice president, he would lose his effectiveness. Unlike the Vatican and the Pope, whose reality-stabilizing device (also known as the Pope) uses religion as a medium to stabilize parts of reality, ███ operates differently. He must continually run for office, continually lose, and continually traverse every inch of the land to maintain reality stability. In essence, ███ serves as a medium, with elections acting as the trigger. The outcome of the elections manifests this stability.

RAISA Observer ███


SCP-ZH-999-A (center) with Lin Ruei-hsiung (left) and Chin Chin-sheng (right) at a People First Party press conference.

Special Containment Procedures:

In accordance with the "Float Operation" protocol, no containment is required for SCP-ZH-999 when it resides within SCP-ZH-999-A. The Records and Information Security Administration (RAISA) is tasked with continuous monitoring of SCP-ZH-999 and must establish the following departments to study its anomalous effects:

  • Public Opinion Control Department
  • Effect Impact Department
  • Strategic Analysis Department
  • Election Research Department

All aforementioned departments and related information are jointly managed by the Three Walls Council and the O5 Council.

Departments established for SCP-ZH-999 are required to fully comply with the "Float Operation" protocol and perform ongoing stability assessments to mitigate potential reality disturbance storms that may occur every four years. The current heads, key personnel, and their real-world cover identities are listed below:


Department NameTitleResponsible Person's NameExpertiseReal World Cover Identity
RAISAZH-999 Observation HeadLee Teng-hui (deceased)Political observation analysis, strategy, economic research, thaumaturgy, reality-bending researchPresident of the Republic of China
Public Opinion Control DepartmentFormer Department HeadChin Chin-sheng (deceased)Public opinion control, reality-bending research, journalism, psychologyThird Spokesperson of the People First Party
Public Opinion Control DepartmentDepartment HeadChang Chao-hsiungPublic opinion control, biomedical science, journalismCurrent Vice Chairman of the People First Party
Effect Impact DepartmentDepartment HeadHuang Shan-shanAnomalous effect impact, thaumaturgy, lawDeputy Mayor of Taipei City
Strategic Analysis DepartmentFormer Department HeadLi Ta-weiAnomalous geopolitical observation, strategic analysis, anomalous effect impactSpokesperson of the Presidential Office of the Republic of China
Strategic Analysis DepartmentDepartment HeadChang Chun-hsiungAnomalous geopolitical observation, strategic analysis, international lawSenior Advisor to the Presidential Office of the Republic of China
Election Research DepartmentResearch HeadTsai Chia-hungAnomalous election research, election research, polling, public opinion researchDirector of the Election Study Center
Election Research DepartmentMain CadreYu Ching-hsinAnomalous election research, anomalous geopolitical observation, psychologyResearcher at the Election Study Cent

Description:

SCP-ZH-999 is a massless Type III anomalous energy aggregate that exists parasitically within a specific human host, designated SCP-ZH-999-A. It maintains energy stability by sharing consciousness with SCP-ZH-999-A. Since its discovery in 1980, the host of SCP-ZH-999 has been Taiwanese politician James Soong (hereinafter referred to as SCP-ZH-999-A). The anomalous effects of SCP-ZH-999 exhibit a reality-stabilizing function. Beginning in 1990, every four years, SCP-ZH-999 randomly fills Hume voids within a specific range. The scope and duration of this effect are contingent upon SCP-ZH-999-A's political influence at the time and the magnitude of reality negative values within the affected area.

The origin of SCP-ZH-999 and its potential connection to the Type III anomalous energy aggregate associated with the Pope in the Vatican remain unknown. Beyond insights from the ZH-999 Observation Head, Lee Teng-hui, the mechanism by which SCP-ZH-999 transfers between individuals is also unclear. Following the death of former President Lee Teng-hui, the Foundation has initiated a re-evaluation of the project, focusing on SCP-ZH-999-A. This effort is led by Huang Shan-shan, head of the Effect Impact Department.

Post-2020, the Foundation entered into an agreement with SCP-ZH-999-A to repurpose SCP-ZH-999 for suppressing specific anomalous phenomena or restoring localized reality, rather than stabilizing the broader Taiwan Strait reality. Additionally, the Foundation is actively assisting SCP-ZH-999-A in identifying a suitable successor host for SCP-ZH-999.

Addendum 1:

[Authorized Access]

Interview Transcript:

Head: I’m sorry, but we’ve finally decided to archive you.
SCP-ZH-999-A: Archive what about me? Who authorized this? Head: It’s the conclusion from above, Chairman.
SCP-ZH-999-A: You’re going to assign me a number?
Head: I’m afraid so.
SCP-ZH-999-A: You’re going to deprive me of my personal freedom. Head: Chairman, you are still free. SCP-ZH-999-A: Yes, but our freedoms have different meanings.

SCP-ZH-999-A Designated Portrait
SCP-ZH-999-A: I think I can request something.
Head: You can make a request. As someone who has long cooperated with the Float Operation, I believe the Foundation will try to accommodate you.
SCP-ZH-999-A: I hope you agree to this first. Head: Chairman… SCP-ZH-999-A: Agree to the photo first; I want to change it to this one.
Head: I think that’s fine, just the photo…
SCP-ZH-999-A: Also, since you often say that I am who I am, I want to do this from "my standpoint."
Head: What do you mean, Chairman?
SCP-ZH-999-A: I want to use my methods and my perspective to write the story of me and this thing. Simply put, you want to assign me a number, but I want to handle this project myself. Head: But you’re not a professional…
SCP-ZH-999-A: But politics is my profession, and currently, you still need me as a tool, don’t you? After all these years, I hope to be treated as I deserve.
`) e.executable.push([e.pages.length - 1, (() => {e.image = e.image = 'https://i.imgur.com/TIenSh1.jpeg'})]) exclusive_action_executed = true; } // ========================================== // ========================================== // 1. 通用定义与辅助函数 (防冲突安全版) // ========================================== // 候选人 ID var ach_ID_CHEN = 67; // 陈水扁 var ach_ID_LIEN = 68; // 连战 var ach_ID_SOONG = 69; // 宋楚瑜 // 1. 获取大选赢家 (防止数据未加载时报错) var ach_winnerID = (e.final_overall_results && e.final_overall_results.length > 0) ? e.final_overall_results[0].candidate : 0; // 2. 获取玩家普选票百分比 var ach_playerVote = FINAL_VOTE_PERCENT; // 3. 获取玩家赢得的县市数量 var ach_winCount = (typeof quickstats !== 'undefined' && quickstats.length > 0) ? quickstats[0] : 0; // 4. 获取难度 (Hell = 0.75) var ach_diff = campaignTrail_temp.difficulty_level_multiplier; // 5. 获取 NPC 的全台得票率 (PVP) - 安全获取函数 function getSafePvp(id) { var c = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json.find(function(x) { return x.pk === id; }); return c ? c.pvp : 0; } var ach_chen_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_CHEN); var ach_lien_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_LIEN); var ach_soong_pvp = getSafePvp(ach_ID_SOONG); // --- 核心辅助函数：获取指定县市的赢家和数据 --- function getAchStateStats(stateId) { // 在 e.final_state_results 中查找对应 ID 的州 var stateData = e.final_state_results.find(function(s) { return s.state === stateId; }); if (!stateData) return null; // 判定赢家：使用 .result (加权分) var winnerObj = stateData.result.reduce(function(best, curr) { return (curr.result > best.result) ? curr : best; }); // 计算该县市总票数 var totalVotes = stateData.result.reduce(function(sum, item) { return sum + item.votes; }, 0); return { winnerId: winnerObj.candidate, results: stateData.result, totalVotes: totalVotes }; } // --- 核心辅助函数：检查某候选人是否赢得了 0 个县市 --- function achHasWonZeroStates(candidateId) { // 只要找到任意一个县市的赢家是该候选人，就返回 false var hasWin = e.final_state_results.some(function(s) { var w = s.result.reduce(function(best, curr) { return (curr.result > best.result) ? curr : best; }); return w.candidate === candidateId; }); return !hasWin; // 如果没找到任何胜利，返回 true (也就是赢了0个) } if (campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id === ach_ID_SOONG) { // Regret of the Century if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG) { ctsAchievement("Regret of the Century"); } // Like Father and Son (不冒犯李登辉) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && e.LeeTengHuiAttacks < 0) { ctsAchievement("Like Father and Son"); } // The Model Governor (>= 18 个县市) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && ach_winCount >= 18) { ctsAchievement("The Model Governor"); } // The Stainless Governor (政治改革 > 3) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && e.PoliticalReformPromise > 3) { ctsAchievement("The Stainless Governor"); } // Birds of a Feather (政治改革 < 0) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && e.PoliticalReformPromise < 0) { ctsAchievement("Birds of a Feather"); } // Just One Step Away (输掉大选，但得票率 > 36%) if (ach_winnerID !== ach_ID_SOONG && ach_playerVote > 36) { ctsAchievement("Just One Step Away"); } // Trading Places (宋赢 > 39%，且陈输 > 36%) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && ach_playerVote > 39 && ach_chen_pvp > 36) { ctsAchievement("Trading Places"); } // Chung Hsing? Never Heard of It (赢且得票率 > 40%) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && ach_playerVote > 40) { ctsAchievement("Chung Hsing? Never Heard of It"); } // Transcending Ethnicity (赢下高雄县 200403) var khCounty = getAchStateStats(200403); if (khCounty && khCounty.winnerId === ach_ID_SOONG) { ctsAchievement("Transcending Ethnicity"); } // The Hard Road (难度 Harder) if (ach_winnerID === ach_ID_SOONG && ach_diff <= 0.85) { ctsAchievement("The Hard Road"); } } return construct(0); } //vp var changeGameDisp = (hide) => { disp = ""; if (hide) { disp = "none"; } Array.from(gameWindow.children).forEach(f=>{ if(!f.classList.contains("game_header") && (f.id != "main_content_area" || !$("#campaign_sign")[0])) f.style.display = disp }); }; e.vpSwitcher = () => { let potential_running_mate_pks = e.running_mate_json.filter(f=>f.fields.candidate == e.candidate_id).map(f=>f.fields.running_mate); let pot_run_mat = potential_running_mate_pks.map(f=>e.candidate_json.find(_f=>_f.pk===f)); let running_mate_options = ``; pot_run_mat.forEach(f=> { running_mate_options += `\n` }); let vp_html = `

Please select your running mate:

  • Name: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.first_name} ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.last_name}
  • Party: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.party}
  • Home State: ${pot_run_mat[0].fields.state}
${pot_run_mat[0].fields.description_as_running_mate}

` let vp_screen = document.createElement("div"); vp_screen.classList.add("inner_window_w_desc"); vp_screen.id = "inner_window_4"; vp_screen.innerHTML = vp_html; changeGameDisp(true); gameWindow.appendChild(vp_screen); // now we make the stuff do stuff! $("#running_mate_id").change((_e)=>{ _e.preventDefault(); let value = Number($("#running_mate_id").val()); let i = potential_running_mate_pks.findIndex(f=>f === value); let screen_html = `
  • Name: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.first_name} ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.last_name}
  • Party: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.party}
  • Home State: ${pot_run_mat[i].fields.state}
${pot_run_mat[i].fields.description_as_running_mate}
`; $("#running_mate_description_window").html(screen_html); }); // VP selected! $("#running_mate_id_button").click((_e)=>{ _e.preventDefault(); let value = Number($("#running_mate_id").val()); let i = potential_running_mate_pks.findIndex(f=>f === value); e.running_mate_last_name = pot_run_mat[i].fields.last_name; e.selected_running_mate = pot_run_mat[i]; $("#inner_window_4").remove(); changeGameDisp(false); }) if(e.running_mate_last_name==="Song Chu-Yu"){ var button1 = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); button1.click(); setTimeout(function(){ var button2 = document.getElementById('resume_questions_button'); button2.click(); }, 50); } } // 1. 定义观察者函数 const resultButtonObserver = new MutationObserver((mutations, observerInstance) => {     for (let mutation of mutations) {         if (mutation.type === "childList") {             const resultButton = document.getElementById("final_result_button");                         if (resultButton) {                 // =============================================== // 【调试信息】打印政治改革和黑金数值 console.log("e.PoliticalReformPromise:", e.PoliticalReformPromise); console.log("e.BlackGoldConnection:", e.BlackGoldConnection); // ===============================================                 // 【切歌逻辑】                 const finalResultPlaylist = new Playlist();                                 // ！！！ 关键修复点：如果 Playlist 构造函数未正确初始化 this.albums，                 // ！！！ 我们尝试在这里手动初始化它，以防止 getCurrentSong 失败。                 // ！！！ 另外，我们假设 addSong 需要 albumIndex 参数 0。                 if (!finalResultPlaylist.albums) {                      finalResultPlaylist.albums = [[]];                 }                 const finalResultSong = new Song(                     "Long March", // 艺术家/作者                     "Luo Da-you", // 歌曲名                     "https://i.scdn.co/image/ab67616d0000b2732fac04820609a7ae9f2d22f1", // 封面图片 URL                     "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/%E9%95%B7%E5%BE%81.mp3?v=1764014123796" // 音频 URL                 );                                 // 明确使用 albumIndex = 0 来确保歌曲被添加到 this.albums[0]                 finalResultPlaylist.addSong(finalResultSong, 0);                 changePlaylist(finalResultPlaylist);                 // ===============================================                                 observerInstance.disconnect();                 break;             }         }     } }); // 2. 启动观察者 resultButtonObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true }); //注释代码 CODE2 function getTooltips(str) { let matches = []; tooltipList.forEach((tooltip, index) => { // Adjust the regex to match searchString potentially surrounded by “ and followed by optional punctuation let regex = new RegExp(`(?<=\\b|\\s|^|“)${tooltip.searchString}(?=[.,;!?]?\\b|\\s|”|$)`, 'g'); let match; while ((match = regex.exec(str)) !== null) { matches.push({ start: match.index + (match[0].startsWith('“') ? 1 : 0), // Adjust for potential starting “ end: match.index + match[0].length - (match[0].endsWith('”') ? 1 : 0) - (match[2] ? 1 : 0), tooltipIndex: index }); } }); // Sort by starting position; if two start at the same position, longer match comes first matches.sort((a, b) => a.start - b.start || b.end - b.start - (a.end - a.start)); // Filter out overlaps for (let i = 0; i < matches.length - 1; ) { if (matches[i + 1].start < matches[i].end) { matches.splice(i + 1, 1); // Remove the next match since it overlaps } else { i++; // Move to next match } } return matches; } function applyTooltips(str) { const matches = getTooltips(str); let result = ''; let lastIndex = 0; // 获取当前候选人 ID const currentCandidatePK = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id; matches.forEach(match => { const tooltip = tooltipList[match.tooltipIndex]; result += str.slice(lastIndex, match.start); // --- 核心逻辑：根据 PK 选取定制文本 --- let finalExplanationText = tooltip.explanationText; try { const customData = JSON.parse(tooltip.explanationText); if (currentCandidatePK && customData[currentCandidatePK]) { finalExplanationText = customData[currentCandidatePK]; } else if (customData.default) { finalExplanationText = customData.default; } } catch (e) { // 如果解析失败，说明它是非定制的普通字符串，保持不变 finalExplanationText = tooltip.explanationText; } // ------------------------------------ result += `${tooltip.searchString}${finalExplanationText}`; lastIndex = match.end; }); result += str.slice(lastIndex); // Add the remainder of the original string return result; } function applyTooltipsToObject(obj) { for (let key in obj) { if (typeof obj[key] === 'string') { obj[key] = applyTooltips(obj[key]); } else if (typeof obj[key] === 'object' && obj[key] !== null) { applyTooltipsToObject(obj[key]); // Recursive call } } } // 只有当玩家在 Code 1 选择了开启（默认）时，才运行注释替换 if (campaignTrail_temp.tooltip_enabled) { applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.questions_json); applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.answers_json); applyTooltipsToObject(campaignTrail_temp.answer_feedback_json); } /* Welcome to Astro's Variable Headquarters This is a fairly simple function you can add to your mods. It will create a little menu in which the player can view the numbers laid out within the functions. This is a great way to give the player a little more information about your mod. Across this code, you will find a lot of aspects you can edit. I have left plenty of comments to help you understand what each part does. Don't be afraid to ask in #mod-help on the Discord for clarification or help with editing this code. To use this, place this code below your Code 2, and edit it as needed. You can duplicate the 'let a = document.createElement('p');' section to add more lines of text. Functions are referenced in text like so: ' + function + '. This will display the number from the function in the text. Credit to Nina, who made the original code that summoned the new screen (originally for the 1960Red/1952Blue advisor screen) Go ahead and use this code in your mods - just give me credit. I hope it helps you out! /* * MODDING FRAMEWORK: Data Center (Polls & Crossover Analysis) * Objective: Provides a data center overlay to analyze poll data (with fog) * while permanently hiding the original sidebar poll numbers. */ // ================================================================= // I. Global Constants and Variables Definition // ================================================================= // Windows 98 Core CSS Colors const WIN98_GREY = '#C0C0C0'; const WIN98_DARK = '#808080'; const WIN98_BLUE = '#000080'; const WIN98_LIGHT = '#FFFFFF'; const WIN98_BORDER_SIZE = '2px'; // Candidate Primary Keys (PKs) for 2000 ROC Presidential Election const CHEN_PK = 67; // Chen Shui-bian (Deep Green) const LIEN_PK = 68; // Lien Chan (Blue) const SOONG_PK = 69; // James Soong (Orange - Independent/PFP later) const HSU_PK = 1921; // Hsu Hsin-liang (Light Green) const LIAO_PK = 1942; // Li Ao (Yellow) // Data Storage Variables var CurrentPollResults = [];      // Stores the corrected/fogged poll data (Read-Only for Mod UI) var SidebarHideStyleTag = null;   // Stores the
Rank Candidate Vote Share (%) Visual Comparison
`; const tbody = container.querySelector('#poll_results_tbody'); let totalVote = 0; CurrentPollResults.forEach(data => { totalVote += data.vote; // Find the full candidate data (from CANDIDATE_DATA) // We use the PK to find the corresponding name in CANDIDATE_DATA const fullData = CANDIDATE_DATA.find(c => { // Clean the name from the poll results (e.g., "Chen Shui Bian (DPP)" -> "Chen Shui Bian") const cleanPollName = data.name.replace(/\s*\([^)]*\)/, '').trim(); return c.name === cleanPollName; }) || { name: data.name, partyIconUrl: '', position: 'N/A', description: 'N/A', imageUrl: '' }; // The display name will be the name without the party abbreviation const displayName = fullData.name; // Create the hoverable name element structure const nameContent = ` ${fullData.partyIconUrl ? `` : ''} ${displayName} `; const row = document.createElement('tr'); row.innerHTML = ` ${data.rank} ${nameContent} ${data.vote.toFixed(1)}%
`; tbody.appendChild(row); }); const sumRow = document.createElement('tr'); sumRow.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; sumRow.innerHTML = ` Total: ${totalVote.toFixed(1)}% `; tbody.appendChild(sumRow); // === Attach Hover Logic to the new table elements === const nameElements = tbody.querySelectorAll('.candidate-name-mod'); nameElements.forEach(element => { const uniqueId = `mod-hover-text-${element.getAttribute('data-name').replace(/\s/g, '-')}`; element.addEventListener('mouseover', function() { if (document.getElementById(uniqueId)) return; const tooltip = document.createElement('span'); tooltip.id = uniqueId; // Get data from attributes const name = element.getAttribute('data-name'); const position = element.getAttribute('data-position'); const description = element.getAttribute('data-description'); const imageUrl = element.getAttribute('data-image'); tooltip.innerHTML = `
${imageUrl ? `` : ''}
${position}
${name}
${description}
`; // Tooltip Styles tooltip.style.position = 'absolute'; const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect(); // Positioning the tooltip relative to the table element (inside the Mod window) let leftPos = rect.right + 10; let topPos = rect.top; // Simple boundary check for Mod window boundaries const modWindow = container.closest('#data_center'); const modWindowRect = modWindow ? modWindow.getBoundingClientRect() : { right: window.innerWidth }; // Check if placing it on the right will exceed the window if (leftPos + 300 > modWindowRect.right) { // Place it on the left instead leftPos = rect.left - 320; } // Adjust coordinates to be relative to the viewport/document tooltip.style.top = `${topPos + window.scrollY}px`; tooltip.style.left = `${leftPos + window.scrollX}px`; // Styling tooltip.style.backgroundColor = '#f8f9fa'; tooltip.style.color = '#212529';           tooltip.style.padding = '15px 20px'; tooltip.style.border = '1px solid #dee2e6'; tooltip.style.borderRadius = '8px'; tooltip.style.boxShadow = '0 6px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)'; tooltip.style.zIndex = '2000'; tooltip.style.whiteSpace = 'normal'; tooltip.style.maxWidth = '300px'; tooltip.style.minWidth = '250px'; document.body.appendChild(tooltip); }); // Mouseout event: Remove Tooltip element.addEventListener('mouseout', function() { const tooltip = document.getElementById(uniqueId); if (tooltip) { tooltip.remove(); } }); }); } /** * Helper function to calculate the 9 voter flow percentages based on the election state. * 使用更通用的字符串匹配来应对 getCrossoverPrediction() 中可能的变化。 */ function getFlowRules(predictionTitle) { // 默认值：三强鼎立 (Gridlock) - 98% 坚守, 1% 跑票给另外两人 let flow = { KMT_to_KMT: 98, KMT_to_DPP: 1, KMT_to_IND: 1, // KMT row DPP_to_KMT: 1, DPP_to_DPP: 98, DPP_to_IND: 1, // DPP row IND_to_KMT: 1, IND_to_DPP: 1, IND_to_IND: 98 // IND row }; // ---------------------------------------------------- // 扁连对决 (Chen-Lien Showdown) - 宋楚瑜 (IND) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- if (predictionTitle.includes("Chen-Lien")) { // 宋楚瑜票源大流向：70% 坚守, 25% Lien, 5% Chen flow.IND_to_KMT = 25; flow.IND_to_DPP = 5; flow.IND_to_IND = 70; } // ---------------------------------------------------- // 扁宋对决 (Chen-Soong Faceoff) - 连战 (KMT) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- else if (predictionTitle.includes("Chen-Soong")) { // <-- 修正：使用更通用的 "Chen-Soong" // 连战票源大流向：70% 坚守, 25% Soong, 5% Chen flow.KMT_to_KMT = 70; flow.KMT_to_DPP = 5; flow.KMT_to_IND = 25; } // ---------------------------------------------------- // 连宋对决 (Lien-Soong Clash) - 陈水扁 (DPP) 票源流向 // ---------------------------------------------------- else if (predictionTitle.includes("Lien-Soong")) { // 陈水扁票源大流向：80% 坚守, 15% Lien, 5% Soong flow.DPP_to_KMT = 15; flow.DPP_to_DPP = 80; flow.DPP_to_IND = 5; } // 如果是 Gridlock (三强鼎立) 或 Clear Leader (明确领先)，则返回默认的 98% 坚守。 return flow; } /** * 2. createCrossoverContent() - Crossover Analysis Interface */ /** * 2. createCrossoverContent() - Crossover Analysis Interface */ function createCrossoverContent(container) { // 1. 获取选情预测和动态流动数据 const prediction = getCrossoverPrediction(); const flow = getFlowRules(prediction.title); // 调用新的流动规则函数 // 2. 将数据转换为带百分号的字符串 // KMT (Lien Chan) Row const KMT_HOLD = flow.KMT_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const KMT_TO_CHEN = flow.KMT_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const KMT_TO_SOONG = flow.KMT_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; // DPP (Chen Shui Bian) Row const DPP_TO_LIEN = flow.DPP_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const DPP_HOLD = flow.DPP_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const DPP_TO_SOONG = flow.DPP_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; // IND (James Soong) Row const IND_TO_LIEN = flow.IND_to_KMT.toFixed(0) + '%'; const IND_TO_CHEN = flow.IND_to_DPP.toFixed(0) + '%'; const IND_HOLD = flow.IND_to_IND.toFixed(0) + '%'; container.style.textAlign = 'left'; container.innerHTML = `

Crossover Flow Analysis Tool

Current Election State Analysis

${prediction.title}

${prediction.message}

Voter Flow Percentage (%)
Flow OUT (FROM) ↓
Flow IN (TO) →		 Lien Chan (KMT) Chen Shui Bian (DPP) James Soong (IND)
Lien Chan (KMT) Base Hold (${KMT_HOLD}) Lost to Chen (${KMT_TO_CHEN}) Lost to Soong (${KMT_TO_SOONG})
Chen Shui Bian (DPP) Flow to Lien (${DPP_TO_LIEN}) Base Hold (${DPP_HOLD}) Flow to Soong (${DPP_TO_SOONG})
James Soong (IND) Flow to Lien (${IND_TO_LIEN}) Flow to Chen (${IND_TO_CHEN}) Base Hold (${IND_HOLD})
`; } function createVariablesContent(container, e) { const context = e || {}; // 🌟 1. 確保變量定義存在（完全保留宋楚瑜的逻辑） const attackCount = context.LeeTengHuiAttacks || 0; const BlackGoldConnection = context.BlackGoldConnection || 0; // 宋楚瑜的核心负面变量 const PoliticalReformPromise = context.PoliticalReformPromise || 0; // 🌟 2. 定义候选人 Logo 映射表 const logoMap = { 68: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/lienlogo.png?v=1766056767641", 69: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/soonglogo.png?v=1766056778163", 67: "https://file.garden/Z9XHdyLGHwUEZPS4/bianlogo.png?v=1766056785831" }; // 获取当前 Logo const currentId = e.candidate_id || (campaignTrail_temp ? campaignTrail_temp.candidate_id : null); const currentLogoUrl = logoMap[currentId] || ""; // 🌟 3. 构建 HTML (包含 Flex 布局) container.style.textAlign = 'left'; container.innerHTML = `

📈 Core Variable Status Tracking (HQ)

Campaign Environment Key Factors

Connection to Black Gold (Corruption Link Score): ${BlackGoldConnection}

Promise of Political Reform (Reform Promise Commitment): ${PoliticalReformPromise}

Number of Attacks on Lee Teng-hui (Lee Attack Count): ${attackCount}

C:\\> run_analysis.exe /v

${currentLogoUrl ? `
ID: ${currentId}
` : ''}
`; } /** * createSoongPolicyFramework() - James Soong Policy Framework Display * Displays James Soong's specific policy scores across 5 policy dimensions */ function createSoongPolicyFramework(container, e) { container.style.textAlign = 'left'; // Define policy issues const POLICY_ISSUES = { 32: { name: "Party Coalition", desc: "Deep Blue (Left KMT but represents traditional deep blue)" }, 33: { name: "Provincialism", desc: "Mostly Mainlanders (Strong mainlander representative)" }, 34: { name: "Political Reform", desc: "Blue camp connections" }, 35: { name: "National Identity", desc: "Centrist identity" }, 36: { name: "Attitude towards Lee Teng-hui", desc: "Intense Hatred (Strong opposition)" } }; // Get James Soong's policy scores function getSoongPolicyScores() { if (typeof campaignTrail_temp === 'undefined' || !campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json) { console.warn('Policy data not available, returning default scores.'); return { 32: 0.5, 33: 0.4, 34: -0.1, 35: 0.15, 36: 0.5 }; } const rawData = campaignTrail_temp.candidate_issue_score_json; const scores = {}; for (const item of rawData) { if (item.fields && item.fields.candidate === SOONG_PK) { const issueId = item.fields.issue; scores[issueId] = item.fields.issue_score; } } // Ensure all issues have values [32, 33, 34, 35, 36].forEach(issueId => { if (scores[issueId] === undefined) { scores[issueId] = 0.0; } }); return scores; } const policyScores = getSoongPolicyScores(); // Generate table rows let tableRows = ''; [32, 33, 34, 35, 36].forEach(issueId => { const score = policyScores[issueId]; const issue = POLICY_ISSUES[issueId]; // Determine color and position description based on score let positionDesc = ''; let scoreColor = '#000000'; if (score > 0.5) { positionDesc = 'Deep Blue/Unification Stance'; scoreColor = '#0000FF'; } else if (score > 0) { positionDesc = 'Light Blue/Centrist Stance'; scoreColor = '#4169E1'; } else if (score === 0) { positionDesc = 'Neutral Stance'; scoreColor = '#808080'; } else if (score > -0.5) { positionDesc = 'Light Green/Localist Stance'; scoreColor = '#32CD32'; } else { positionDesc = 'Deep Green/Independence Stance'; scoreColor = '#228B22'; } tableRows += ` ${issue.name} ${score.toFixed(2)} ${issue.desc} ${positionDesc} `; }); container.innerHTML = `

📋 James Soong Policy Framework

Policy Stance Scores ${tableRows}
Policy Issue Score Description Position Category
Score Explanation

Score Range: -1.0 to +1.0

  • Above +0.5: Deep Blue/Unification Stance
  • 0 to +0.5: Light Blue/Centrist Stance
  • 0: Neutral Stance
  • -0.5 to 0: Light Green/Localist Stance
  • Below -0.5: Deep Green/Independence Stance

C:\\> policy_framework.exe /candidate=James_Soong

`; } /** * 4. createTrendContent() - Poll Trend Chart Interface */ /** * createTrendContent(container) * Creates the content for the Poll Trend tab, including a dedicated horizontal scrolling wrapper. * FIX: Set fixed height (500px) to force Chart.js to render Y-axis correctly. */ function createTrendContent(container) { const historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); // --- 1. 创建水平滚动隔离容器 --- const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper'; chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; // 启用手动水平滚动 chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'scroll'; chartWrapper.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; // --- 2. 创建图表容器 --- const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; // *** 关键：固定高度 500px，解决 Y 轴渲染问题 *** chartContainer.style.height = '500px'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); container.appendChild(chartWrapper); // --- 3. 渲染图表 --- renderPollTrendChart(historicalData); } // ================================================================= // IV. Interface Control Functions (CSS Hide Mode) // ================================================================= /** * addDataCenterButton() * Configures the Mod entry point (both original custom button and hijacked PV button) * and sets up hover effects. */ /** * addDataCenterButton() * Configures the Mod entry point and triggers AUTO-RECORDING of poll data. */ function addDataCenterButton() { // 1. 尝试找到参照物按钮 (View Electoral Map) const refButton = document.getElementById('view_electoral_map'); // 2. 检查是否需要创建按钮 (如果参照物存在，且我们的按钮还不存在) if (refButton && !document.getElementById('data_center_button')) { const newButton = document.createElement('button'); newButton.id = 'data_center_button'; newButton.style.marginLeft = '1.5em'; newButton.innerHTML = 'Campaign Data Center'; newButton.addEventListener('click', openDataCenter); refButton.insertAdjacentElement('afterend', newButton); // ========================================================== // *** 核心新增功能：自动后台记录 (Auto-Record) *** // ========================================================== // 只要按钮被创建，说明进入了新回合。我们延迟 200ms 确保数据加载完毕， // 然后在后台静默计算并存储数据，无需玩家点击。 setTimeout(() => { // 确保函数存在且游戏数据有效 if (typeof generateModData === 'function' && typeof compileHistoricalPollData === 'function' && checkCampaignTrailData()) { // 1. 生成/更新当前的带迷雾民调 (CurrentPollResults) generateModData(); // 2. 将结果存入 PollTrendCache (供折线图使用) // compileHistoricalPollData 内部有防重复机制，不会重复存同一回合 compileHistoricalPollData(); console.log("System: Poll data auto-recorded for background tracking."); } }, 200); // ========================================================== } // Core A: Enable sidebar candidate Hover Effects if (typeof addCandidateHoverEffects === 'function') { addCandidateHoverEffects(); } // Core B: Hijack the PV Switcher button if (typeof hijackPVSwitcher === 'function') { hijackPVSwitcher(); } } /** * openDataCenter() * Opens the Windows 98-style multi-tab Data Center, hiding original polls via CSS. */ function openDataCenter() { let questions = document.querySelector(".inner_window_question"); if (!questions) return; // 1. Data Check and Retrieval if (!checkCampaignTrailData()) { alert("Error: Failed to retrieve real-time poll data. Ensure the game is in a turn where data has loaded."); questions.style.display = ''; addDataCenterButton(); return; } // Core: Generate Mod-specific read-only data generateModData(); // Hide the question interface questions.style.display = 'none'; // 2. Remove the current button const dataButton = document.getElementById('data_center_button'); if (dataButton) { dataButton.remove(); } // Core: Inject CSS to hide sidebar poll numbers, summary, and buttons if (!document.getElementById('hide_sidebar_style')) { SidebarHideStyleTag = document.createElement('style'); SidebarHideStyleTag.id = 'hide_sidebar_style'; SidebarHideStyleTag.textContent = ` /* 1. Hide Poll Numbers using transparent color (keeping names visible) */ ${CANDIDATE_LIST_ID} { color: transparent !important; } ${CANDIDATE_LIST_ID} b { color: black !important; /* Restore candidate names color */ } /* 2. Hide State Summary Information */ ${STATE_SUMMARY_CONTAINER_ID} { display: none !important; } /* 3. Hide PV/EV Buttons */ ${BUTTON_PV_ESTIMATE_ID}, ${BUTTON_EV_ESTIMATE_ID} { display: none !important; } `; document.head.appendChild(SidebarHideStyleTag); } // --- 3. Create Main Container (Win98 Window) --- let mainDiv = document.createElement('div'); mainDiv.id = 'data_center'; mainDiv.style.color = '#000000'; mainDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; mainDiv.style.border = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderTop = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderLeft = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_LIGHT}`; mainDiv.style.borderRight = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; mainDiv.style.borderBottom = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; mainDiv.style.boxShadow = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} ${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} 0 ${WIN98_DARK}, ${parseInt(WIN98_BORDER_SIZE) * 2}px ${parseInt(WIN98_BORDER_SIZE) * 2}px 0 #000000`; mainDiv.style.borderRadius = '0'; mainDiv.style.height = '60%'; mainDiv.style.width = '80%'; mainDiv.style.margin = 'auto'; mainDiv.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; mainDiv.style.display = 'flex'; mainDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; questions.parentNode.insertBefore(mainDiv, questions.nextSibling); // --- 4. Title Bar and Navigation --- let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_BLUE; headerDiv.style.color = WIN98_LIGHT; headerDiv.style.padding = '3px'; headerDiv.style.cursor = 'default'; let titleText = document.createElement('span'); titleText.textContent = 'Campaign Data Center - [System]'; titleText.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; headerDiv.appendChild(titleText); mainDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); let navContainer = document.createElement('div'); navContainer.style.display = 'flex'; navContainer.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; navContainer.style.borderBottom = `${WIN98_BORDER_SIZE} solid ${WIN98_DARK}`; navContainer.style.padding = '4px 2px 0 10px'; mainDiv.appendChild(navContainer); // Exit Button let backButton = document.createElement('button'); backButton.innerText = 'Exit'; backButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; backButton.style.color = '#000000'; backButton.style.border = 'none'; backButton.style.padding = '3px 8px'; backButton.style.marginRight = '10px'; backButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; backButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; backButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #808080'; backButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #808080'; backButton.onclick = function() { // Core: Remove CSS to restore the sidebar if (SidebarHideStyleTag) { SidebarHideStyleTag.remove(); SidebarHideStyleTag = null; } mainDiv.remove(); questions.style.display = ''; addDataCenterButton(); } navContainer.appendChild(backButton); // Tabs Container let tabsContainer = document.createElement('div'); tabsContainer.style.display = 'flex'; navContainer.appendChild(tabsContainer); // 5. Content Area let contentDiv = document.createElement('div'); contentDiv.id = 'tab_content'; contentDiv.style.padding = '10px'; contentDiv.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_LIGHT; contentDiv.style.flexGrow = '1'; contentDiv.style.overflowY = 'auto'; contentDiv.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderTop = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.borderRight = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.margin = '5px'; mainDiv.appendChild(contentDiv); // 假設 e 是當前競選上下文的全局或外部可訪問變數 // 如果 e 在此作用域內無法直接存取，您需要將整個 Tab 建立邏輯包裹在一個接收 e 的函數中。 // --- 6. Tab Definitions and Switching Logic --- const tabs = [ { id: 'polls', label: 'Polls', contentFunc: createPollsContent }, { id: 'crossover', label: 'Crossover Analysis', contentFunc: createCrossoverContent }, { id: 'data_stats', label: 'Core Variables (HQ)', contentFunc: createVariablesContent }, { id: 'poll_trend', label: 'Poll Trend', contentFunc: createTrendContent }, { id: 'soong_policy', label: 'Soong Policy Framework', contentFunc: createSoongPolicyFramework } ]; // 1. 修改函數簽名，加入 e 參數 function switchTab(tabId, e) { contentDiv.innerHTML = ''; tabs.forEach(tab => { let tabButton = document.getElementById('tab_' + tab.id); if (tabButton) { if (tab.id === tabId) { tabButton.style.padding = '4px 10px 5px 10px'; tabButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_LIGHT; if (tab.contentFunc) { // 2. 將 e 傳遞給內容生成函數 tab.contentFunc(contentDiv, e); } } else { tabButton.style.padding = '3px 10px 6px 10px'; tabButton.style.borderTop = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderLeft = '1px solid #FFFFFF'; tabButton.style.borderRight = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.borderBottom = '1px solid #808080'; tabButton.style.backgroundColor = WIN98_GREY; } } }); } // ------------------------------------------------------------------ // Create tab buttons tabs.forEach(tab => { let btn = document.createElement('button'); btn.id = 'tab_' + tab.id; btn.innerText = tab.label; btn.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; btn.style.fontSize = '12px'; btn.style.color = '#000000'; btn.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; btn.style.cursor = 'pointer'; btn.style.marginRight = '2px'; // 3. 修改按鈕點擊事件，確保它能存取 e 並傳遞給 switchTab // *** 您需要確保在這裡可以存取到當前的 'e' 對象 *** btn.onclick = () => switchTab(tab.id, e); tabsContainer.appendChild(btn); }); // Display the first tab by default // 確保在初始化顯示時也傳遞 e switchTab(tabs[0].id, e); } /** * createTrendContent(container) * Creates the content for the Poll Trend tab, including a dedicated horizontal scrolling wrapper. * FIX: Set fixed height (500px) to force Chart.js to render Y-axis correctly. */ function createTrendContent(container) { // 假设 historicalData 可以在全局访问，或通过其他函数获取 const historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); // --- 1. 创建水平滚动隔离容器 --- const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper'; chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'scroll'; chartWrapper.style.overflowY = 'hidden'; // --- 2. 创建图表容器 --- const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; // *** 关键修正：使用明确的像素高度（例如 500px），解决刻度压缩问题 *** chartContainer.style.height = '500px'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); container.appendChild(chartWrapper); // --- 3. 渲染图表 --- renderPollTrendChart(historicalData); } // ================================================================= // V. Initialization Logic (Mutation Observer) // ================================================================= let observerRunning = false; function handleMutations(mutationsList, observer) { if (observerRunning) return; observerRunning = true; // 这一行是关键，它在每次 Mutation (界面变动，包括加载新问题) 后尝试执行 addDataCenterButton(); // Re-observe if the DOM changes again observer.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); observerRunning = false; } // MOD Execution Entry Point let element = document.getElementById('controlElement'); if (!element) { // Only observe once until the control element is added (to prevent infinite loops) let singleObserver = new MutationObserver(handleMutations); singleObserver.observe(document.documentElement, { childList: true, subtree: true }); // Add a control element to indicate the mod has started observation let controlElement = document.createElement('div'); controlElement.style.display = 'none'; controlElement.id = 'controlElement'; document.body.appendChild(controlElement); } //关键的恢复原始投票函数 function showOverallResult() { const targetElement = document.getElementById('overall_result'); if (targetElement) { // 这行代码是关键！它会覆盖您的 style_overwrite.innerHTML 中的 !important targetElement.style.setProperty('display', 'block', 'important'); // 如果 ul 子元素也被隐藏，同时显示它 const ulElement = targetElement.querySelector('ul'); if (ulElement) { ulElement.style.setProperty('display', 'block', 'important'); } } } // ================================================================= // VI. Final Election Result Chart Integration // ================================================================= /** * 1. Calculate Actual Election Results & Format for Chart * 获取最终选举结果，并将其格式化为图表所需的格式，作为"下一回合"的数据。 */ /** * 1. Calculate Actual Election Results & Format for Chart * 获取最终选举结果 (修正版：指定读取主候选人，排除副总统) */ function getFinalResultsAsTrendData(nextTurnIndex) { if (!campaignTrail_temp || !campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json) return []; // 安全获取数据的辅助函数 (防止游戏数据未加载导致报错) const getPvp = (index) => { if (campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json[index]) { return campaignTrail_temp.candidate_json[index].pvp; } return 0; }; // 1. 根据您提供的索引获取 PVP (0.35 -> 35.0) // 索引顺序：0=Chen, 2=Soong, 4=Lien, 6=Hsu, 8=Li Ao let final_chen_pvp = getPvp(0) * 100; let final_soong_pvp = getPvp(2) * 100; let final_lien_pvp = getPvp(4) * 100; let final_hsu_pvp = getPvp(6) * 100; let final_liao_pvp = getPvp(8) * 100; let finalData = []; // 2. 手动构建数据对象 (只构建这5个人，绝不会出现副总统) // Chen Shui-bian (Deep Green) if (final_chen_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: CHEN_PK, // 67 name: "Chen Shui Bian (Actual)", vote: final_chen_pvp, color: "#008000" }); } // Lien Chan (Blue) if (final_lien_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: LIEN_PK, // 68 name: "Lien Chan (Actual)", vote: final_lien_pvp, color: "#0000FF" }); } // James Soong (Orange) if (final_soong_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: SOONG_PK, // 69 name: "James Soong (Actual)", vote: final_soong_pvp, color: "#FF8C00" }); } // Hsu Hsin-liang if (final_hsu_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: HSU_PK, // 1921 name: "Hsu Hsin-liang (Actual)", vote: final_hsu_pvp, color: "#90EE90" }); } // Li Ao if (final_liao_pvp > 0) { finalData.push({ turn: nextTurnIndex, pk: LIAO_PK, // 1942 name: "Li Ao (Actual)", vote: final_liao_pvp, color: "#FFFF00" }); } return finalData; } /** * 2. Open Final Chart Window * 打开最终图表窗口（复用 Win98 风格，但针对最终画面微调） */ /** * openFinalChartWindow() * 打开最终图表窗口 * 结局时调用：isFinalMode = true */ function openFinalChartWindow() { // 1. 准备数据 let historicalData = compileHistoricalPollData(); let maxTurn = 0; if (historicalData.length > 0) { maxTurn = Math.max(...historicalData.map(d => d.turn)); } // 获取真实结果，设为下一回合 const finalResults = getFinalResultsAsTrendData(maxTurn + 1); const combinedData = [...historicalData, ...finalResults]; // 2. 创建窗口 (简略版，只列出核心逻辑) const existingWin = document.getElementById('final_chart_window'); if (existingWin) existingWin.remove(); let mainDiv = document.createElement('div'); mainDiv.id = 'final_chart_window'; mainDiv.style.position = 'fixed'; mainDiv.style.top = '10%'; mainDiv.style.left = '10%'; mainDiv.style.width = '80%'; mainDiv.style.height = '70%'; mainDiv.style.zIndex = '9999'; mainDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#C0C0C0'; mainDiv.style.border = '2px solid #FFFFFF'; mainDiv.style.borderRight = '2px solid #808080'; mainDiv.style.borderBottom = '2px solid #808080'; mainDiv.style.boxShadow = "4px 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"; mainDiv.style.display = 'flex'; mainDiv.style.flexDirection = 'column'; mainDiv.style.fontFamily = 'Tahoma, Geneva, sans-serif'; document.body.appendChild(mainDiv); // Header let headerDiv = document.createElement('div'); headerDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#000080'; headerDiv.style.color = '#FFFFFF'; headerDiv.style.padding = '4px'; headerDiv.style.display = 'flex'; headerDiv.style.justifyContent = 'space-between'; headerDiv.innerHTML = 'Final Review: Polls vs. Reality'; let closeBtn = document.createElement('button'); closeBtn.innerText = 'X'; closeBtn.style.fontWeight = 'bold'; closeBtn.style.marginLeft = '10px'; closeBtn.onclick = function() { mainDiv.remove(); }; headerDiv.appendChild(closeBtn); mainDiv.appendChild(headerDiv); // Content let contentDiv = document.createElement('div'); contentDiv.style.flexGrow = '1'; contentDiv.style.padding = '10px'; contentDiv.style.backgroundColor = '#FFFFFF'; contentDiv.style.margin = '5px'; contentDiv.style.border = '1px solid #808080'; contentDiv.style.overflow = 'hidden'; mainDiv.appendChild(contentDiv); const chartWrapper = document.createElement('div'); chartWrapper.id = 'poll_trend_wrapper_final'; // 使用不同ID防止冲突 chartWrapper.style.width = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.style.overflowX = 'auto'; const chartContainer = document.createElement('div'); chartContainer.id = 'poll_trend_chart_container'; // 必须匹配 render 函数里寻找的ID chartContainer.style.width = '100%'; chartContainer.style.height = '100%'; chartWrapper.appendChild(chartContainer); contentDiv.appendChild(chartWrapper); // *** 关键修改：传入 true，启用星星特效和 RESULT 标签 *** renderPollTrendChart(combinedData, true); } /** * 3. Check for Final Results Screen & Inject Button * 检测是否到达结局画面，并插入按钮 */ function checkForFinalScreen() { const footer = document.getElementById('map_footer'); const readingBtn = document.getElementById('recommended_reading_button'); // 条件：footer存在，reading按钮可见，且我们的按钮还没添加 if (footer && readingBtn && window.getComputedStyle(readingBtn).display !== 'none' && !document.getElementById('final_poll_chart_button')) { const myBtn = document.createElement('button'); myBtn.id = 'final_poll_chart_button'; myBtn.className = 'final_menu_button'; // 复用游戏原有样式类 myBtn.innerHTML = 'Poll Trend Chart'; // 样式微调，使其在最左侧 myBtn.style.marginRight = '10px'; // 绑定点击事件 myBtn.onclick = openFinalChartWindow; // 插入到 footer 的最前面 (最左边) footer.insertBefore(myBtn, footer.firstChild); } } // ================================================================= // VII. Updated Observer Logic (Override) // ================================================================= // 更新原有的 handleMutations 函数，或者创建一个新的 Observer 来运行 // 为了安全起见，我们添加一个新的独立 Observer 专门用于结局检测，以免破坏您上面的逻辑 const finalScreenObserver = new MutationObserver(function(mutations) { checkForFinalScreen(); }); // 开始监测 body finalScreenObserver.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true }); // 另外，为了防止现有 Observer 冲突，您可以在这里手动执行一次检查 checkForFinalScreen();
